text: Alota is a genus of grasshoppers in the subfamily Gomphocerinae with species found in Bolivia and Colombia.Bruner, L. 1913. Annals of the Carnegie Museum 8(3-4):446, 454. == Species == The following species are recognised in the genus Alota: * Alota boliviana Bruner, 1913 * Alota carbonelli Cadena- Castañeda & Cardona, 2015 == References == Category:Acrididae
title: Alota (grasshopper)
